name: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc.
description: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company headquartered in the United States, primarily focused on the Permian Basin, one of the most prolific oil-producing regions in the country. Founded in 2017, Riley Exploration aims to acquire, develop, and operate attractive oil and gas assets with a focus on maximizing shareholder value. The company employs advanced drilling techniques and technologies to optimize production efficiency and reduce environmental impact. Riley Exploration is committed to sustainable operations, utilizing best practices in environmental stewardship and safety measures to ensure responsible resource extraction. The company's portfolio includes a variety of producing wells and development projects, allowing it to leverage its technical expertise to enhance production and reserves. With a strong emphasis on operational excellence, Riley Exploration seeks to grow its asset base through strategic acquisitions and organic development, positioning itself as a key player in the energy sector.
